title: travelplanner: Could you assist in creating a week-long travel plan for one person, starting from Indianapolis and venturing through 3 cities in North Carolina from March 7th to March 13th, 2022? The planned budget for the trip is $6,500. (bc5e54c8fc36205d)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Could you assist in creating a week-long travel plan for one person, starting from Indianapolis and venturing through 3 cities in North Carolina from March 7th to March 13th, 2022? The planned budget for the trip is $6,500.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Create a week-long travel plan for one person starting from Indianapolis and visiting three cities in North Carolina (Charlotte, Raleigh, and Asheville) from March 7th to March 13th, 2022. The budget for the trip is $6,500. Include transportation, accommodation, and meal options within the budget. Provide details for each day, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, and attractions to visit."}

chat_history.content:
### Week-Long Travel Plan from Indianapolis to North Carolina

#### Day 1: March 7, 2022 - Travel to Charlotte
- **Flight**: 
  - Departure: Indianapolis at 08:07 AM
  - Arrival: Charlotte at 09:50 AM
  - Cost: $105

- **Accommodation**: 
  - **Elegant Studio Apt in Prospect Heights**
    - Cost: $640 per night
    - Type: Entire home/apt
    - House Rules: No parties
    - Maximum Occupancy: 5

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Olive Tree Cafe - Average Cost: $23
  - **Lunch**: Central Perk 7 - Average Cost: $87
  - **Dinner**: Kylin Skybar - Average Cost: $44

- **Attractions**:
  - Freedom Park
  - Levine Museum of the New South

#### Day 2: March 8, 2022 - Explore Charlotte
- **Accommodation**: Elegant Studio Apt in Prospect Heights

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Grover's - The Baker Shop - Average Cost: $30
  - **Lunch**: China Garden - Average Cost: $14
  - **Dinner**: Nagaland's Kitchen - Average Cost: $73

- **Attractions**:
  - Discovery Place Science
  - NASCAR Hall of Fame

#### Day 3: March 9, 2022 - Travel to Raleigh
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Charlotte to Raleigh
  - Distance: 170 miles
  - Estimated Cost: $50 (rental + fuel)

- **Accommodation**: 
  - **Family-friendly, cozy guest room**
    - Cost: $549 per night
    - Type: Private room
    - House Rules: No pets
    - Maximum Occupancy: 1

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Shogun Japanese Steak House - Average Cost: $83
  - **Lunch**: Wood Stone - Average Cost: $55
  - **Dinner**: The Giggling Goat - Average Cost: $56

- **Attractions**:
  - No specific attractions found in Raleigh

#### Day 4: March 10, 2022 - Explore Raleigh
- **Accommodation**: Family-friendly, cozy guest room

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Ichiban - Average Cost: $14
  - **Lunch**: TGI Friday's - Average Cost: $58
  - **Dinner**: Deep Chicken Corner - Average Cost: $50

- **Attractions**:
  - No specific attractions found in Raleigh

#### Day 5: March 11, 2022 - Travel to Asheville
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Raleigh to Asheville
  - Distance: 250 miles
  - Estimated Cost: $70 (rental + fuel)

- **Accommodation**: 
  - **Beautiful place**
    - Cost: $1181 per night
    - Type: Entire home/apt
    - House Rules: No pets
    - Maximum Occupancy: 2

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Vince's Restaurant & Pizzeria - Average Cost: $71
  - **Lunch**: Vadakkan Pepper - Average Cost: $71
  - **Dinner**: Pizza Hut - Average Cost: $90

- **Attractions**:
  - Asheville Pinball Museum
  - Botanical Gardens at Asheville

#### Day 6: March 12, 2022 - Explore Asheville
- **Accommodation**: Beautiful place

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Glen's Bakehouse - Average Cost: $22
  - **Lunch**: Snax Points - Average Cost: $76
  - **Dinner**: Bisht Food Court - Average Cost: $72

- **Attractions**:
  - Western North Carolina Nature Center
  - The North Carolina Arboretum

#### Day 7: March 13, 2022 - Return to Indianapolis
- **Flight**: No direct flight available from Asheville to Indianapolis on this date. Consider driving back to Charlotte and taking a flight from there.
  - **Alternative Plan**: Drive from Asheville to Charlotte (125 miles, estimated cost $35) and take a flight from Charlotte to Indianapolis.
  - **Flight**: 
    - Departure: Charlotte at 06:00 AM
    - Arrival: Indianapolis at 07:30 AM
    - Cost: $193

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: The Taste of Punjab - Average Cost: $17
  - **Lunch**: Sugar Boutique - Average Cost: $54
  - **Dinner**: Captain Grub - Average Cost: $61

### Budget Summary
- **Flights**: $105 (IND to CLT) + $193 (CLT to IND) = $298
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Charlotte: $640 x 2 nights = $1280
  - Raleigh: $549 x 2 nights = $1098
  - Asheville: $1181 x 2 nights = $2362
- **Meals**: Approx. $150 per day x 7 days = $1050
- **Transportation**: Approx. $155 (self-driving costs)
- **Total**: $298 + $1280 + $1098 + $2362 + $1050 + $155 = $6243

This plan fits within the $6500 budget, leaving some room for additional expenses or activities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
### Week-Long Travel Plan from Indianapolis to North Carolina

#### Day 1: March 7, 2022 - Travel to Charlotte
- **Flight**: 
  - Departure: Indianapolis at 08:07 AM
  - Arrival: Charlotte at 09:50 AM
  - Cost: $105

- **Accommodation**: 
  - **Elegant Studio Apt in Prospect Heights**
    - Cost: $640 per night
    - Type: Entire home/apt
    - House Rules: No parties
    - Maximum Occupancy: 5

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Olive Tree Cafe - Average Cost: $23
  - **Lunch**: Central Perk 7 - Average Cost: $87
  - **Dinner**: Kylin Skybar - Average Cost: $44

- **Attractions**:
  - Freedom Park
  - Levine Museum of the New South

#### Day 2: March 8, 2022 - Explore Charlotte
- **Accommodation**: Elegant Studio Apt in Prospect Heights

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Grover's - The Baker Shop - Average Cost: $30
  - **Lunch**: China Garden - Average Cost: $14
  - **Dinner**: Nagaland's Kitchen - Average Cost: $73

- **Attractions**:
  - Discovery Place Science
  - NASCAR Hall of Fame

#### Day 3: March 9, 2022 - Travel to Raleigh
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Charlotte to Raleigh
  - Distance: 170 miles
  - Estimated Cost: $50 (rental + fuel)

- **Accommodation**: 
  - **Family-friendly, cozy guest room**
    - Cost: $549 per night
    - Type: Private room
    - House Rules: No pets
    - Maximum Occupancy: 1

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Shogun Japanese Steak House - Average Cost: $83
  - **Lunch**: Wood Stone - Average Cost: $55
  - **Dinner**: The Giggling Goat - Average Cost: $56

- **Attractions**:
  - No specific attractions found in Raleigh

#### Day 4: March 10, 2022 - Explore Raleigh
- **Accommodation**: Family-friendly, cozy guest room

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Ichiban - Average Cost: $14
  - **Lunch**: TGI Friday's - Average Cost: $58
  - **Dinner**: Deep Chicken Corner - Average Cost: $50

- **Attractions**:
  - No specific attractions found in Raleigh

#### Day 5: March 11, 2022 - Travel to Asheville
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Raleigh to Asheville
  - Distance: 250 miles
  - Estimated Cost: $70 (rental + fuel)

- **Accommodation**: 
  - **Beautiful place**
    - Cost: $1181 per night
    - Type: Entire home/apt
    - House Rules: No pets
    - Maximum Occupancy: 2

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Vince's Restaurant & Pizzeria - Average Cost: $71
  - **Lunch**: Vadakkan Pepper - Average Cost: $71
  - **Dinner**: Pizza Hut - Average Cost: $90

- **Attractions**:
  - Asheville Pinball Museum
  - Botanical Gardens at Asheville

#### Day 6: March 12, 2022 - Explore Asheville
- **Accommodation**: Beautiful place

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: Glen's Bakehouse - Average Cost: $22
  - **Lunch**: Snax Points - Average Cost: $76
  - **Dinner**: Bisht Food Court - Average Cost: $72

- **Attractions**:
  - Western North Carolina Nature Center
  - The North Carolina Arboretum

#### Day 7: March 13, 2022 - Return to Indianapolis
- **Flight**: No direct flight available from Asheville to Indianapolis on this date. Consider driving back to Charlotte and taking a flight from there.
  - **Alternative Plan**: Drive from Asheville to Charlotte (125 miles, estimated cost $35) and take a flight from Charlotte to Indianapolis.
  - **Flight**: 
    - Departure: Charlotte at 06:00 AM
    - Arrival: Indianapolis at 07:30 AM
    - Cost: $193

- **Meals**:
  - **Breakfast**: The Taste of Punjab - Average Cost: $17
  - **Lunch**: Sugar Boutique - Average Cost: $54
  - **Dinner**: Captain Grub - Average Cost: $61

### Budget Summary
- **Flights**: $105 (IND to CLT) + $193 (CLT to IND) = $298
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Charlotte: $640 x 2 nights = $1280
  - Raleigh: $549 x 2 nights = $1098
  - Asheville: $1181 x 2 nights = $2362
- **Meals**: Approx. $150 per day x 7 days = $1050
- **Transportation**: Approx. $155 (self-driving costs)
- **Total**: $298 + $1280 + $1098 + $2362 + $1050 + $155 = $6243

This plan fits within the $6500 budget, leaving some room for additional expenses or activities.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
